name: SmartHint
headline: Elevate the shopping experience of your online store using Artificial Intelligence.
overview: Connect to SmartHint services and elevate your online store's shopping experience using Artificial Intelligence to increase the number of conversions.
features: Adapt the products of the showcases according to the profile of each user
Generate urgency with pop-ups on product pages and abandonment of purchase
Reduce the need for manual customization of storefronts
Increase the relevance of the products shown on the website's homepage
additionalInformation: For information on available plans, visit: https://www.smarthint.co/
